body:
I wrote, in haste:


> Hi everyone,
> 
> I am experimenting with a very large model and am hitting that "set 
> overflow in addobject" error.  I'm in the initial stages of preparing 
> this model and like to use that objview command to look at the rad 
> files, so I'm just wondering of there's a way to tell objview to use a 
> higher resolution, giving objview a new -r parameter to pass on to oconv?


Duh.  After peeking at the script a *second* time, I saw where the oconv 
options are hard coded in there.  Made me a copy and changed the -r 
parameter, and that worked fine.  Just postin' this here in case anyone 
else was wondering.






      Rob Guglielmetti


e. rpg@rumblestrip.org
w. www.rumblestrip.org
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2003-August/000920.html).</sup>
